document_data.name: The Athora
document_data.creator: The [[Ba'etith]]
document_data.mainbody: The '''Athora''' was a gigantic alien rock located under [[Thaymount]], which greatly enhanced [[magic]] spell and [[:category:magic items|magic items]]. It was considered one of the major reasons behind the power of the [[Red Wizards of Thay]].{{Cite web/theedverse/2019-05-26 - The Athora}}{{Cite web/theedverse/2020-03-30 - Thayan snake sculptures}}
document_data.Powers: In addition to its innate abilities to empower magic, the Athora was a [[weave anchor]], helping [[Mystra]] stabilize the [[Weave]].{{Cite web/theedverse/2021-02-24 - Weave Anchors}}
document_data.History: The Athora was created by the [[Ba'etith]]. It was located in the [[Assikhath]], a cavern deep under Thaymount guarded by powerful protective statues.
